items.sentence: Don\'t forget to tell Mary that she needs to do that.
For once in my life, I\'d like to do something right.
Tom died because he had eaten some contaminated beef.
Tom flew to Boston to attend his daughter\'s wedding.
Tom doesn\'t know what Mary means when she says that.
Mary\'s boyfriend is three years younger than she is.
Tom didn\'t even notice that Mary was looking at him.
Tom didn\'t give me a chance to explain what I meant.
Tom didn\'t have very many friends when he was young.
Tom didn\'t know how to do what Mary asked him to do.
